statements.query: MATCH ((n:AutoScalingGroup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})) where EXISTS(n.exposed_internet) WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE REMOVE n.exposed_internet, n.exposed_internet_type return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

name: AWS auto scale group asset internet exposure
